DOC.brief_summary: The objective study describe relationship among whey protein consume meal food intake pre- post-meal satiety , blood glucose healthy young adult .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Whey Protein Short-Term Food Intake Post-Meal Blood Glucose Response Young Men
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , cross-over design study conduct . Whey protein preloads ( 10-40 g ) provide 300 ml water . At 30 min follow consumption , subject feed ad libitum pizza meal . Satiety , blood glucose measure baseline select interval pre- ( 0 , 15 30 min ) post-meal ( 50 , 65 , 80 95 min ) .
DOC.criteria: healthy normal weight ( 1824.9 kg/m² ) young age 2027 year old breakfast skipper smoker dieter individual diabetes ( fast BG ≥ 7.0 mmol/L ) metabolic disease
